SELECT count(*) FROM tab_order WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId}

SELECT o.id id, o.user_id user_id, o.seller_id seller_id, s.username seller_name, u.username user_name, o.address address, o.total_price total_price, o.create_time create_time, i.id order_item_id, i.order_id order_id, i.goods_id goods_id, i.goods_count goods_count, g.id goods_id_pk, g.name goods_name, g.img_url goods_img_url FROM tab_order o, tab_seller s, tab_user u, tab_order_item i, tab_goods g WHERE o.id like #{id} AND s.id = o.seller_id AND u.id = o.user_id AND i.order_id = o.id AND i.goods_id = g.id LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT o.id id, o.user_id user_id, o.seller_id seller_id, s.username seller_name, u.username user_name, o.address address, o.total_price total_price, o.create_time create_time, i.id order_item_id, i.order_id order_id, i.goods_id goods_id, i.goods_count goods_count, i.status goods_status, g.id goods_id_pk, g.name goods_name, g.img_url goods_img_url, g.price goods_price FROM tab_order o, tab_seller s, tab_user u, tab_order_item i, tab_goods g WHERE o.seller_id = #{sellerId} AND s.id = o.seller_id AND u.id = o.user_id AND i.order_id = o.id AND i.goods_id = g.id LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT o.id id, o.user_id user_id, o.seller_id seller_id, s.username seller_name, u.username user_name, o.address address, o.total_price total_price, o.create_time create_time, i.id order_item_id, i.order_id order_id, i.goods_id goods_id, i.goods_count goods_count, i.status goods_status, g.id goods_id_pk, g.name goods_name, g.img_url goods_img_url , g.price goods_price FROM tab_order o, tab_seller s, tab_user u, tab_order_item i, tab_goods g WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND s.id = o.seller_id AND u.id = o.user_id AND i.order_id = o.id AND i.goods_id = g.id LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT o.id id, o.user_id user_id, o.seller_id seller_id, i.id order_item_id, i.order_id order_id, i.goods_id goods_id, i.goods_count goods_count FROM tab_order o, tab_order_item i WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND i.order_id = o.id AND i.goods_id = #{goodsId}
